page.title: 20Sport in Willenhall.
page.content: The most popular sport is soccer; there are 2 professional clubs nearby, Walsall who are in Division 3 and Wolverhampton Wanderers who have just been relegated from Division 2. There is also a non league side called Willenhall Town who play in the Gola League.There are several junior leagues for enthusiasts on Saturday afternoons and Sunday mornings. Cricket is also popular in the summer although there are hardly any good grounds in the area.Other sports which are played in schools include netball,rounders,hockey,tennis,squash, badminton,athletics,swimming and rugby football.However,there is nowhere to develop these sports out of school in Willenhall.Fishing,snooker and bowls are also popular and pubs provide pool tables and dart boards.Jogging and Marathon running have also caught on.
